intent_atoms.description: Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate the end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow introduced in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/48_macOS_SwiftUI_Automation_Streaming_Default_Selection/48_macOS_SwiftUI_Automation_Streaming_Default_Selection.md
The ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests must pass on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support, confirming the end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow works as documented.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness
The Combine-backed UI benchmark must run successfully on macOS, capturing latency metrics and achieving throughput parity with the CLI harness.
XCTest skips the scenario on Linux because Combine is unavailable; therefore tests must be executed only on platforms where Combine is available (macOS).
Surface session persistence errors once diagnostics plumbing is available.
Session persistence errors should be surfaced to users or developers when diagnostics plumbing is enabled.
Reconcile CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities when reconciliation rules defined.
CoreData session bookmarks and live bookmark entities must match after reconciliation based on defined rules.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests
functional_units.description: Runs end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow for streaming UI coverage on macOS

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI benchmark
functional_units.description: Executes Combine-based UI benchmark to capture latency metrics while maintaining CLI throughput parity on macOS

functional_units.description: Surface session persistence errors once diagnostics plumbing is available

functional_units.name: CoreData bookmark reconciliation
functional_units.description: Reconcile CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities according to defined rules

functional_units.name: Automation via Apple Events for notarized builds
functional_units.description: Evaluate and extend entitlements for automation through Apple Events in notarized builds

functional_units.description: Produce user manuals covering CLI and app workflows
